TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataGridItemEventHandler(object sender, DataGridItemEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataGridItemEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataGridItemEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DataGridItemEventArgs)
public delegate void DataGridItemEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DataGridItemEventArgs ^ e);
type DataGridItemEventHandler = delegate of obj * DataGridItemEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項之 和 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the and events of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的項目時，會引發事件建立控制項。The event is raised when an item in the control is created. 中的項目時，會引發事件控制項所繫結至資料來源。The event is raised when an item in the control is bound to a data source. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以顯示的順序中建立項目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the order in which items are created in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridItemEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItemEventArgs Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridItemEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItemEventArgs Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/CS/datagriditemdataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/VB/datagriditemdataboundvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridItemDataBound2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound2/CS/datagriditemdatabound2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridItemDataBound2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound2/VB/datagriditemdatabound2vb.aspx#1)]
